text: Kaadu A- Nabiyow cusey! Nabii Nuuc, Nabii Ibraahim kee Nabii luutuk naharat isi Rabbih seeceeh, isi mara abaare waqdi, tokkel keenit abe abaar√≥ Yalli kaak oggolleeh, kaa kee kaal yeemene mara kaxxa gibdaabinay (maggo leet aben xuumiyya kinnuk) kaa cine mari edde finqitek naggosneh iyye Yalli
